alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Deuel; Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 6:43PM CDT until May 29 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Eastern Deuel County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 543 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Lewellen to near Kingsley Dam to near Big Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Big Springs, Arthur, Brule, Lewellen, Barton, Lemoyne, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Ruthon, Haythorn Lake, Nevens, Megeath, Broganville, and McKeag. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 86 and 124. Highway 92 between mile markers 115 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 102 and 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
